Package DAO

Class CustomerDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.CustomerDAO
public class CustomerDAO extends Object
Handles data access operations for customer data.

      public static boolean insertCustomer(Customer customer)
      Inserts a new customer into the database.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • updateCustomer

      public static boolean updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates a customer record in the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object containing updated data.
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteCustomer

      public static boolean deleteCustomer(int id)
      Deletes the customer record from the database associated with the provided unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the customer to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the deletion was successful, false otherwise.

    • selectAllCustomers

      public static List<Customer> selectAllCustomers()
      Fetches all customer records from the database and returns them in a list.
      Returns:
      The list of all customers in the database, or null if no customer records were found.

    • selectCustomerById

      public static Customer selectCustomerById(int id)
      Gets a customer record from the database with the provided customer ID. The returned record includes customer details with associated division and country information.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer to get.
      Returns:
      The customer record, or null if not found.
